> While lying on the ground, Tucson picks up Lord Elder's transmission.
>
>=
 " I copy that, Lord Elder... I know just the thing too. By the way, I need=
 you to activate a holographic field on me. As far as Hydras knows, Night S=
hift has mutilated me to the point of irecognizable proportions. I need a h=
ologram of me in a dismantled state of being. That should also draw out who=
's hiding behind the cloaked field. Tucson out."

Lord Elder get's a confus=
ed look on his face, "He wants a holographic
projection?" He looked over at=
 Elita for a moment and then back at the
terminal in front of him. "He didn=
't mention that in the planning
stages. If we could do that we could have h=
idden the Ark with it."
Elder grumbled under his breath. "it's not as if Mi=
rage or Hound are
standing here at my back."

Reopening the communication l=
ink Elder spoke, "We don't have a
projector. Maybe try landing in mid trans=
formation? It may look
convincing if they don't look hard enough." He shook=
 his head tiredly
as he waited for a response.

(TAG)

OOC: By the way, whe=
re is this taking place? Right outside the Ark,
near the Hydras' base or so=
mewhere in between? I wasn't quite sure. I
think I thought you were near Hy=
dras' base.

Preston
